w16cs350.datatype

Class A_Shape

  • java.lang.Object
    • w16cs350.datatype.A_Shape
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ShapeArc, ShapeLine

    public abstract class A_Shape
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines the shared elements of all geometric shapes that consist of a single path from a start position to an end position. Start and end positions are defined in terms of delta coordinates in meters from reference coordinates in the world.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Creates a shape.

      Creates a shape.

        index - - the optional arbitrary index; typically used by the client to manage shapes, which otherwise have no identifier
